name: blankly
content:
blankly adverb
(NO INTEREST)
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that shows no understanding, interest, or emotion: He just stared blankly at me.

(COMPLETELY)
completely or absolutely: She blankly refused to accept any offer of help.
